content: {"name": "Diaper Bank of North Carolina", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The mission of Diaper Bank of North Carolina is to promote and protect the dignity of each resident by ensuring that families with babies and children living with poverty have an adequate supply of diapers; advocating for policy reform so that diapers and period products are included in the definition of and provision for the basic human needs of families; and creating a diaper bank model that can be shared, replicated, and adopted by all counties in North Carolina.\nFind your local office: https://ncdiaperbank.org/charlotte-branch", "email": "", "url": "https://ncdiaperbank.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(919) 886-8085", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}]}
